scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix phonebook-front && npm install --prefix phonebook-backend
scripts.test: npm test --prefix phonebook-front && npm test --prefix phonebook-backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix phonebook-front && npm run lint --prefix phonebook-backend
scripts.dev: npm start --prefix phonebook-front & npm run dev --prefix phonebook-backend
scripts.build: npm run build:front && npm run copy-dist
